Articles.Content:
![CxsiTie.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CxsiTie.jpg)

The Kerbus K329. Seats 20-24 people, all business class. Follows the laws of physics. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

*If only there's a bigger landing gear...*

Rover wheels on the front enables it to taxi around the area, then line up on the runway to takeoff again.

Shown here during its maiden flight: KSC -> Island Base. Bill visiting the old parts shack.

![OClVVrj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OClVVrj.jpg)

Video of it in action soon! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
So,THAT'S where they put the old capsule
No wonder why they're found "lying on side of the road"...
